item.description:
Come get pampered with a fabulous Manicure & Pedicure for just $35.00 plus tip! Or you can get one or the other for even less $ - I'll tell you the back massage chair you sit in while getting a Pedicure is worth it alone! A great way to destresssss before the holidays!

PS: Only reserve if you know your absolutely coming for reservations are limited!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a name tag that says, "Girl's Just Wanna Have Fun!"

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Manicures & Pedicures at Fancy Nails in Hyannis
